message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It holds immense value to us, but recognizing its potential worth to you, we propose a price of $1,200,000. We believe this offers a fair balance between the value it brings to both parties. Looking forward to your consideration.
Thank you for presenting your offer, Alice. I recognize the value of the product, but I believe a price of $1,050,000 would be more reflective of a fair deal. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, we appreciate your valuation of the product. In response, we propose a price of $1,150,000. This reflects a compromise that acknowledges the value you see in the product while also considering our position. We look forward to your response.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be frank, I'm targeting a purchase price closer to $1,000,000. Would you be willing to come down to $1,100,000?

Hello Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product. We've given your latest offer careful consideration, and we're pleased to counter with a price of $1,125,000. This reflects an attempt to meet in the middle while still valuing our product appropriately. We hope this proposal works for you.
